The Jinmei Pingshang Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province, specifically in the town of Duan Shi

operators: Shanxi Jinmei Group Pingshang Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Jinmei Group Pingshang Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Jinneng Group.
